languages.text: "Мощь машинного отрицания. Ноосферный сигнал, прерывающий всякую жизнь, сотворенную Омниссией". {n}По трещине на респираторе Паскаля пробегает зеленый проблеск.{/n} "Та сила, коей я пользовался прежде... неосознанно".

"The power of machine negation. A Noospheric signal that interrupts any and all life created by the Omnissiah." {n}A green flash runs along the crack in Pasqal's respirator.{/n} "The power that I used to tap into... unconsciously."
languages.original_text: "Мощь машинного отрицания. Ноосферный сигнал, прерывающий всякую жизнь, сотворенную Омниссией". {n}По трещине на респираторе Паскаля пробегает зеленый проблеск.{/n} "Та сила, коей я пользовался прежде... неосознанно".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The power of machine negation. A Noospheric signal that interrupts any and all life created by the Omnissiah." {n}A green flash runs along the crack in Pasqal's respirator.{/n} "The power that I used to tap into... unconsciously."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「機械と交渉する力です。種類を問わず万機神が創造したあらゆる生命に、人類の信号を割り込ませた」{n}緑の明滅がパスカルの呼吸器に走る。{/n}「自分はその力を使っていた…無意識に」
languages.original_text: "The power of machine negation. A Noospheric signal that interrupts any and all life created by the Omnissiah." {n}A green flash runs along the crack in Pasqal's respirator.{/n} "The power that I used to tap into... unconsciously."

traits.locale_text: 「機械と交渉する力です。種類を問わず万機神が創造したあらゆる生命に、人類の信号を割り込ませた」{n}緑の明滅がパスカルの呼吸器に走る。{/n}「自分はその力を使っていた…無意識に」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “那种力量可以否定机械本身。它是一种通感信号，可以终结欧姆尼塞亚所创造的一切生命。”{n}绿色的光芒沿着帕斯卡的呼吸器缝隙流过。{/n}“我曾深入挖掘过那样的力量……在我不知不觉的时候。”
languages.original_text: "The power of machine negation. A Noospheric signal that interrupts any and all life created by the Omnissiah." {n}A green flash runs along the crack in Pasqal's respirator.{/n} "The power that I used to tap into... unconsciously."

traits.locale_text: “那种力量可以否定机械本身。它是一种通感信号，可以终结欧姆尼塞亚所创造的一切生命。”{n}绿色的光芒沿着帕斯卡的呼吸器缝隙流过。{/n}“我曾深入挖掘过那样的力量……在我不知不觉的时候。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le pouvoir d'anéantir les machines. Un signal noosphérique mettant un terme définitif à toute vie créée par l'Omnimessie. » {n}La fissure dans le respirateur de Pasqal est parcourue d'un éclair vert.{/n} « Une puissance dont je me suis déjà servie par le passé... sans m'en rendre compte. »
languages.original_text: "The power of machine negation. A Noospheric signal that interrupts any and all life created by the Omnissiah." {n}A green flash runs along the crack in Pasqal's respirator.{/n} "The power that I used to tap into... unconsciously."

traits.locale_text: « Le pouvoir d'anéantir les machines. Un signal noosphérique mettant un terme définitif à toute vie créée par l'Omnimessie. » {n}La fissure dans le respirateur de Pasqal est parcourue d'un éclair vert.{/n} « Une puissance dont je me suis déjà servie par le passé... sans m'en rendre compte. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El poder para negar a las máquinas. Usa una señal noosférica para acabar con cualquier vida creada por el Omnissiah». {n}Un destello verde atraviesa la grieta del respirador de Pasqal.{/n} «El poder del que solía sacar provecho... inconscientemente».
languages.original_text: "The power of machine negation. A Noospheric signal that interrupts any and all life created by the Omnissiah." {n}A green flash runs along the crack in Pasqal's respirator.{/n} "The power that I used to tap into... unconsciously."

traits.locale_text: «El poder para negar a las máquinas. Usa una señal noosférica para acabar con cualquier vida creada por el Omnissiah». {n}Un destello verde atraviesa la grieta del respirador de Pasqal.{/n} «El poder del que solía sacar provecho... inconscientemente».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Macht der Maschinennegation. Ein noosphärisches Signal, das sämtliches vom Omnissiah erschaffenes Leben unterbricht." {n}Ein grüner Blitz läuft durch den Riss in Pasqals Respirator.{/n} "Die Macht, die ich früher angezapft habe ... unbewusst."
languages.original_text: "The power of machine negation. A Noospheric signal that interrupts any and all life created by the Omnissiah." {n}A green flash runs along the crack in Pasqal's respirator.{/n} "The power that I used to tap into... unconsciously."

traits.locale_text: "Die Macht der Maschinennegation. Ein noosphärisches Signal, das sämtliches vom Omnissiah erschaffenes Leben unterbrach." {n}Ein grüner Blitz läuft durch den Riss in Pasqals Respirator.{/n} "Die Macht, die ich früher angezapft habe ... unbewusst."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Makine değilleme gücü. Hermesih'in yarattığı tüm yaşamlara müdahale eden Noosferik bir sinyal." {n}Pasqal'ın solunum maskesindeki çatlakta yeşil bir parıltı çakılıyor.{/n} "Eskiden... Bilinçsizce dokunduğum güç."
languages.original_text: "The power of machine negation. A Noospheric signal that interrupts any and all life created by the Omnissiah." {n}A green flash runs along the crack in Pasqal's respirator.{/n} "The power that I used to tap into... unconsciously."

traits.locale_text: "Makine değilleme gücü. Hermesih tarafından yaratılan tüm yaşamlara müdahale eden Noosferik bir sinyal." {n}Pasqal'ın solunum maskesindeki çatlakta yeşil bir parıltı dolanıyor.{/n} "Eskiden... Bilinçsiz bir şekilde dokunduğum güç."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
